name: py-scikit-image

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Image processing algorithms for SciPy, including IO, morphology,
filtering, warping, color manipulation, object detection, etc.

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-wheel
dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description:
NumPy is the fundamental package for scientific computing with Python.
It contains among other things: a powerful N-dimensional array object,
sophisticated (broadcasting) functions, tools for integrating C/C++ and
Fortran code, and useful linear algebra, Fourier transform, and random
number capabilities

dependencies.name: py-scipy
dependencies.description:
SciPy (pronounced "Sigh Pie") is a Scientific Library for Python. It
provides many user-friendly and efficient numerical routines such as
routines for numerical integration and optimization.

dependencies.name: py-networkx
dependencies.description:
NetworkX is a Python package for the creation, manipulation, and study
of the structure, dynamics, and functions of complex networks.

dependencies.name: pil
dependencies.description:
Pillow-SIMD is a SIMD-enabled fork of Pillow. It is usually 4-6x faster
than the original Pillow in image processing benchmarks.

dependencies.name: py-imageio
dependencies.description:
Python library for reading and writing image data. Imageio is a Python
library that provides an easy interface to read and write a wide range
of image data, including animated images, video, volumetric data, and
scientific formats. It is cross-platform, runs on Python 2.7 and 3.4+,
and is easy to install.

dependencies.name: py-tifffile
dependencies.description: Read and write image data from and to TIFF files.

dependencies.name: py-pywavelets
dependencies.description:
PyWavelets is a free Open Source library for wavelet transforms in
Python

dependencies.name: py-packaging
dependencies.description: Core utilities for Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-lazy-loader
dependencies.description: lazy_loader makes it easy to load subpackages and functions on demand.

dependencies.name: py-meson-python
dependencies.description: Meson Python build backend (PEP 517).

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-cython
dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.

dependencies.name: py-pythran
dependencies.description: Ahead of Time compiler for numeric kernels.

dependencies.name: py-numpydoc
dependencies.description: numpydoc - Numpy's Sphinx extensions

dependencies.name: py-matplotlib
dependencies.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.

dependencies.name: py-six
dependencies.description: Python 2 and 3 compatibility utilities.

dependencies.name: py-pooch
dependencies.description:
Pooch manages your Python library's sample data files: it automatically
downloads and stores them in a local directory, with support for
versioning and corruption checks.

dependencies.name: py-dask
dependencies.description: Dask is a flexible parallel computing library for analytics.

dependencies.name: py-cloudpickle
dependencies.description: Extended pickling support for Python objects.

dependent_to.name: py-niworkflows
dependent_to.description: Common workflows for MRI (anatomical, functional, diffusion, etc)

dependent_to.name: py-imgaug
dependent_to.description:
A library for image augmentation in machine learning experiments,
particularly convolutional neural networks. Supports the augmentation of
images, keypoints/landmarks, bounding boxes, heatmaps and segmentation
maps in a variety of different ways.

dependent_to.name: py-continuum
dependent_to.description: A clean and simple data loading library for Continual Learning

dependent_to.name: py-statmorph
dependent_to.description:
Python code for calculating non-parametric morphological diagnostics of
galaxy images.

dependent_to.name: py-pathml
dependent_to.description: An open-source toolkit for computational pathology and machine learning.

dependent_to.name: py-torchgeo
dependent_to.description:
TorchGeo: datasets, samplers, transforms, and pre-trained models for
geospatial data. TorchGeo is a PyTorch domain library, similar to
torchvision, providing datasets, samplers, transforms, and pre-trained
models specific to geospatial data.

dependent_to.name: py-cinema-lib
dependent_to.description:
cinema_lib is a set of tools and library for interacting with a Cinema
database (currently Spec A and Spec D) through Python and the command
line tool, cinema.

dependent_to.name: py-astropy
dependent_to.description:
The Astropy Project is a community effort to develop a single core
package for Astronomy in Python and foster interoperability between
Python astronomy packages.

dependent_to.name: py-scikit-learn
dependent_to.description: A set of python modules for machine learning and data mining.

dependent_to.name: py-tomopy
dependent_to.description:
TomoPy is an open-source Python package for tomographic data processing
and image reconstruction.

dependent_to.name: py-intensity-normalization
dependent_to.description: Normalize intensities of images from various MRI modalities

dependent_to.name: py-neurora
dependent_to.description: A Python Toolbox for Multimodal Neural Data Representation Analysis.

dependent_to.name: py-cinemasci
dependent_to.description: A set of python tools for reading, writing and viewing Cinema databases
